data.title: A Three Hour Tour!
data.text: Have been to Marietta Square many times and wasn't sure how we were going to kill 3 hours...but we did and I learned a lot about the history of not only the amazing restaurants we visited but also about the Square. I was totally full after our tastings at 7 locations. And our guides were kind enough to set up as many food allergy alternative choices as possible for our group. None of us have severe allergies, but it was nice to have a gluten free cupcake! Great way to spend some time in a beautiful, historic area, sampling great food!

data.title: Great outing!
data.text: Wonderful time!  Hosts were great -very knowledgeable. Food was delicious and great variety. Loved the tidbits of history thrown in. Great experience!

data.title: Good tour and nice variety of food
data.text: The tour had a good assortment of food, history, and culture. The tour included 5 food stops, 1 coffee, and 1 wine bar stop. Great information on getting to know the Marietta, would recommend to any first timers to the area. The history of Marietta was light but knowledge of the chefs and restaurant were good. While food was good, the size did not leave you full for the day. Still needed dinner that night. The tour guides provided a good wealth of information including how to stay informed of upcoming events.

data.title: Thank you it was fun.
data.text: The couple who gave the tour were great. My only negatives were having to stand at Paul's which was my fav. food and having only water to drink.

data.title: Deedy from Fayetteville, GA
data.text: Excellent from start to finish.  The food was plentiful and delicious and all of the restaurants we visited had very warm and friendly people to serve and assist us including the owners.  My favorite was the Columbian restaurant only because it was one of my favorite foods. The tour was like a 2 for 1 since we learned so many historical facts about Marietta and Georgia as well as what the city and the Square has to offer year round.  I'll definitely go back and tell others as well as join in some of the festive events that take place in Marietta Square or just relax taking in the scenery since the entire Square is so accommodating.

data.title: Great Food Tour!
data.text: This was an opportunity to learn about Marietta history, find some new places to dine, meet some interesting people while taking a leisurely walk. A very enjoyable afternoon ... I'd highly recommend it!

data.title: Well worth it!
data.text: Thoroughly enjoyed the food tour!  I have lived in the area for 30 years and learned a few things while enjoying food from several Marietta Square restaurants. I feel I found a couple of treasures in my own backyard!

data.title: Family Birthday Fun
data.text: We are able to book a private party with Marietta Food Tours during the week for my mom's 65th birthday. We could not have asked for a better experience! Even as locals we learned some history about the square and hearing the stories of the chefs and how they ended up on the square was a lot of fun. All of the food we tried was excellent. Several of the dishes were not things that I would normally order and I'm so glad for the opportunity to step out of my comfort zone and try them, delish. Anyone from Marietta also knows how packed the square can get so having reserved space at all of the restaurants and not having a wait was definitely a treat. We would highly recommend taking advantage of tour! Round up your family and closest friends and book a private tour, you won't be disappointed!

owner_response.author: Brian B, Owner at Marietta Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We were so very happy to accommodate your family for a very special private Birthday tour!  Everyone seemed to really enjoy themselves and we are quite humbled that you chose our tour to celebrate your sweet Mom's Bday.  We love showing off our town square and make people become a Marietta Square insider.  Hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Informative & Delicious
data.text: What a fun time! I lived in Marietta for years, and learned more in just a few hours than I ever had before on my own. Now when I come home to visit, I'll have a list of delicious restaurants to try again. The guides are so friendly and fun, and informative, with bits of history about the buildings and the Square and the restaurants. It's obvious they have great relationships with the business owners. I'd recommend this to anyone... maybe you're wanting to learn about new places yourself, maybe you're new to town, or maybe entertaining guests. Whatever the cause, the tour is great!

data.title: Great for locals and tourists
data.text: We are local and bought tickets for the Marietta Food Tour while some out-of-town guests were visiting with us.  It's a great way to spend the afternoon and see a little more of the square than you can normally see.  The tour guides are great!  Very accommodating, positive, and informative!  I hope to do it again soon.

data.title: Great day!
data.text: What a wonderful overview of a historic area with many interesting food options. The tastings were yummy! Much knowledge was gained about the area.  I would recommend taking this tour.

data.title: Terrific Tour
data.text: Having moved to Marietta a few years ago, we knew it was time to get to know the Square and signed up for a tour. We weren't disappointed! A well paced tour with knowledgeable husband and wife guides. Time well spent and a must for visitors as well as residents!

data.title: Food and Fun
data.text: We truly enjoyed our experience with Marietta Food Tours!  We ate many different types of food, learned the history of the foods as well as the community!  We would truly recommend this tour for visitors and residents of the Atlanta area as well‼️

data.title: Marietta Square Food Tour
data.text: This was an  excellent way to spend an afternoon!! The food was excellent as was the history of the town and different restaurants we visited! Thanks for a lovely day!

data.title: Delightful Food Tour!
data.text: We loved the variety of the foods chosen, the leisurely walk around the square, all the local information.  We felt pampered!  Thank you.

data.title: Great Food Tour
data.text: This was a great idea. Not only was the food great but we got a learning experience from behind the scenes with very friendly hosts. Highly recommend.

data.title: Fun Day in Marietta
data.text: We had a lovely day.  There was  a good combination of seeing different restaurants ( some of which we have never been to) seeing behind the scenes, learning about Marietta and meeting the owners.  Pace was perfect. The variety of food was good. Our hosts were friendly and knowledgeable.  We are glad for having invested three hours in the food tour.

owner_response.author: Brian B, Owner at Marietta Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for choosing our tour, and we are very glad you joined us to become a "Marietta Square Insider!"  We have a great variety of eateries and we hope you come back to experience more on your own.  Be sure to like us on Facebook for updates on discounts and other fun info about Marietta Square.  Thanks again so much!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Food Tour
data.text: Awesome first food tour ever been on. It was a fantastic adventure. I would highly recommend it to everyone. The places were great. The food was out of this world. The flavors complemented each other. The couple doing the presentation did an awesome job as well. Knew what they were talking about and interacted with the people very well.

data.title: Great way to visit new restaurants and see the city
data.text:
My husband I had a great time on the tour. We have been to marietta square many times . The places we visited were almost all new to us and so we will be visiting them
Again for a meal . Good for out of towners  and locals alike.  Very vibrant husband and wife tour team. Highly recommend .

data.title: Fun fabulous food!
data.text: I thoroughly enjoyed this tour.  I had a great time and was able to learn a lot about food and Marietta.  Wonderful tour guides!!   I would highly recommend this tour for everyone.
